attributes.action: Increase the seat pitch on all commercial flights arriving or departing from British Airports, to a minimum of 32" Short Haul and 34" Long Haul.  Also to increase the width of the seats by a minimum of 3".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By increasing the minimum to these levels will ensure that passengers are comfortable during the flight and avoid the problems of DVT thus saving NHS funds in the future.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
